name: Argomon_(In-Training)
description: Argomon (In-Training) resembles a green flapjack octopus ( Opisthoteuthis californiana ) with an eyespot in the front, in reference to Argus Panoptes , and a pair of eyes resembling those of a snail infected with Leucochloridium paradoxum on top of its head. It has nine short tendrils tipped with drills and a pair of purple arms. It has a disk-like mouth with six triangular plates on its underside.
